tool_description: Query for rent and sale properties in Spain, Italy, Portugal
name: Idealista
title: Idealista

api_list.name: properties/list
api_list.description: List properties for sale or rent in Italy, Spain, Portugal with options and filters

required_parameters.name: locationId
required_parameters.description: The value of locationId field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint. Do NOT use together with zoiId parameter

optional_parameters.name: auction
optional_parameters.description: Leave empty or one of the following : excludeAuctions|onlyAuctions

optional_parameters.name: housemates
optional_parameters.description: One of the following 2|3|4 (separated by comma for multiple values, Ex : 3,4)

optional_parameters.name: distance
optional_parameters.description: The radius to look for properties inside

optional_parameters.name: sinceDate
optional_parameters.description: One of the following Y|W|M  (Last 48 hours|Last week|Last month)

optional_parameters.name: isPoi
optional_parameters.description: true|false - Whether or not is it a point of interest, this parameter only works with zoiId parameter

optional_parameters.name: accessible
optional_parameters.description: true|false - Whether or not is the property accessible

optional_parameters.name: maxItems
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: numPage
optional_parameters.description: The page index for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: floorHeights
optional_parameters.description: One of the following topFloor|intermediateFloor|groundFloor (separated by comma for multiple values. Ex :  topFloor,groundFloor)

optional_parameters.name: zoiId
optional_parameters.description: The value of zoiId field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint. Do NOT use together with locationId parameter

api_list.name: zois/detail
api_list.description: Get information about specific zone of interest

required_parameters.name: zoiId
required_parameters.description: The value of zoiId field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: properties/detail

required_parameters.name: propertyCode
required_parameters.description: The value of propertyCode field returned in .../properties/list endpoint

api_list.name: auto-complete
api_list.description: Get auto complete suggestion by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: prefix
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with
